query.name: findByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE subject_id = ?

query.name: findAll
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject

query.name: findAnotherByIdentifier
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE unique_identifier = ? and subject_id !=?

query.name: findAllByLimit
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject where rownum <= 5

query.name: findAllChildrenByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject where mother_id=? or father_id=?

query.name: findByUniqueIdentifier
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE unique_identifier=?

query.name: getCountWithFilter
query.sql: select count (DISTINCT s.subject_id) as count from subject s,study_subject ss,study,user_account ua where s.subject_id = ss.subject_id and study.study_id = ss.study_id

query.name: getWithFilterAndSort
query.sql: select * from( select x.*, rownum as r from ( select DISTINCT s.* from subject s,study_subject ss,study,user_account ua where s.subject_id = ss.subject_id and study.study_id = ss.study_id

query.name: findAllSubjectsAndStudies
query.sql: SELECT s.*, ss.label, stu.unique_identifier AS study_unique_identifier FROM subject s, study_subject ss, study stu WHERE s.subject_id = ss.subject_id AND ss.study_id = stu.study_id ORDER BY s.subject_id, stu.study_id

query.name: findByUniqueIdentifierAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT s.* FROM subject s, study_subject ss, study st WHERE s.subject_id=ss.subject_id AND ss.study_id= st.study_id AND s.unique_identifier=? AND st.study_id=?

query.name: findByUniqueIdentifierAndAnyStudy
query.sql: SELECT s.* FROM study_subject ss JOIN subject s on s.subject_id=ss.subject_id JOIN study st on st.study_id= ss.study_id WHERE s.unique_identifier=? AND (st.parent_study_id=? OR st.study_id=?)

query.name: findByUniqueIdentifierAndParentStudy
query.sql: SELECT s.* FROM subject s, study_subject ss, study st WHERE s.subject_id=ss.subject_id AND ss.study_id= st.study_id AND s.unique_identifier=? AND st.parent_study_id=?

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO subject (STATUS_ID, DATE_OF_BIRTH,GENDER,UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER,DATE_CREATED, OWNER_ID,DOB_COLLECTED) VALUES (?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE subject SET STATUS_ID=?, DATE_OF_BIRTH=?,GENDER=?,UNIQUE_IDENTIFIER=?, DATE_UPDATED=?, UPDATE_ID=?,DOB_COLLECTED=? WHERE SUBJECT_ID=?

query.name: getCurrentPrimaryKey
query.sql: SELECT subject_id_seq.currval AS key from dual

query.name: findAllMales
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE gender='m'

query.name: findAllFemales
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE gender='f'

query.name: findAllFemalesNotSelf
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE gender='f' and subject_id !=?

query.name: findAllMalesNotSelf
query.sql: SELECT * FROM subject WHERE gender='m' and subject_id !=?

query.name: deleteTestSubject
query.sql: delete from subject where unique_identifier=?
